title: Automated Budget System In State Governance Sector
description: This intelligent budgeting system empowers government ministries to manage resources efficiently while supporting transparency, compliance, and data-driven decision-making for both new and experienced public administrators.

title: Empowering Mexicans with Novel Digital Banking

title: Turning Liv Bank into Spatial Banking Experience

title: Envisioning Conversational Banking in the Style of ChatGPT
description: Garanti BBVA's Securities eTrader mobile app empowers new users to master financial markets while catering to the needs of experienced traders.
